attributes.action: Override Jersey government, step in and protect the people of Jersey!!
attributes.additional_details: I have lived on Jersey for around 15 yrs previously and class that Island as one of my homes, I have been in constant contact with friends and family, my concern is they haven't been taking this virus seriously and are not able to cope with this sort of crisis, please step in and assist with them as im not sure they have even been thought about in these unprecedented times, thanks
attributes.background: Acknowledge Jersey is not coping with this pandemic and step in to assist them and protect the Islanders

rejection.details:
Response to the coronavirus pandemic is a matter for the Government or Jersey, not the UK Government or Parliament. This would include any requests for assistance. 

The Government of Jersey has its own petitions system: https://petitions.gov.je/
